# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur, President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializes in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over two decades of experience, he empowers businesses to thrive through digital transformation, innovative IoT solutions, and Industry 4.0 expertise.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris has 25+ years of experience integrating business systems into manufacturing processes. He is an expert in Industrial IoT (IIoT) and developed the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach (Connect, Collect, Combine, Compute, Convey) for IIoT implementation.
